verses.name: Luke 18:14
verses.text: I tell you, this man went down to his house justified rather than the other: for every one that exalteth himself shall be abased; and he that humbleth himself shall be exalted.

verses.name: Luke 18:15
verses.text: And they brought unto him also infants, that he would touch them: but when his disciples saw it, they rebuked them.

verses.name: Luke 18:16
verses.text: But Jesus called them unto him, and said, Suffer little children to come unto me, and forbid them not: for of such is the kingdom of God.
